sentences.en: (= write down ) the number of cars that pass.
sentences.cn: 记下经过车辆的数目。

sentences.en: Don't forget to keep a careful tally of what you spend.
sentences.cn: 别忘了仔细记下你的开支账目.

sentences.en: He added to his tally in the last minute.
sentences.cn: 他在比赛最后一分钟又得了分.

sentences.en: He kept a running tally of who had called him, who had visited, who had sent flowers.
sentences.cn: 他不断记录着又有谁给他打电话，拜访过他，或给他送花。

sentences.en: Her list does not tally with mine.
sentences.cn: 她的单子与我的不相符.

sentences.en: His story doesn't tally with yours.
sentences.cn: 他说的话跟你说的不相符.

sentences.en: She made a record tally.
sentences.cn: 她获得了创纪录的比分.

sentences.en: Some of the records held by the accounts departments did not tally.
sentences.cn: 会计部门的一些账目有出入。

sentences.en: The facts mentioned in the report tally to every detail.
sentences.cn: 报告中所提到的事实都丝毫不差.

sentences.en: The figures didn't seem to tally.
sentences.cn: 数字好像不符。

sentences.en: The final tally was $465,000.
sentences.cn: 总的支出是46.5万美元。

sentences.en: The final tally was 817 votes for her and 731 for Mr Lee.
sentences.cn: 最后得出的票数是她817票，李先生731票。

sentences.en: The tally was three yeas and two nays, so the yeas have it.
sentences.cn: 投票结果是三票赞成两票反对, 投赞成票者胜利.

sentences.en: The tally was two ayes and three nays.
sentences.cn: 投票结果是两票赞成,三票反对.

sentences.en: the two goals that took his tally for Scotland to 15
sentences.cn: 使他在苏格兰队的总进球数达到15个的两粒进球

sentences.en: The two stories do not tally.
sentences.cn: 两种说法对不上.

sentences.en: They do not keep a tally of visitors to the palace, but it is very popular.
sentences.cn: 他们没有对来宫殿的游客作一个记录，不过这个地方非常受欢迎的。

sentences.en: This description didn't seem to tally with what we saw.
sentences.cn: 这一描述似乎与我们目睹的情况不符。

sentences.en: You can buy on tally in this shop.
sentences.cn: 在这家商店里可以赊购.

sentences.en: Your figures don't tally with mine.
sentences.cn: 你的数字和我的不符.

words.tran_cn: 高的；长的；过分的；夸大的
以分期方式售货的商人；装卸货计数人；带样品卖货的人

trans.tran_en: a record of how much you have spent, won etc by a particular point in time
if numbers or statements tally, they match exactly

trans.tran_cn: 测量，计数，通过做记号记录，加标签于，使符合，使吻合
